lines.text: No matter what your sexual preference, true love is always the ultimate fantasy.
The Feather. When the sun comes up, the bras come down. It is dark and time for our sunrise special. Cock-a-doodle-doo!
They have a Club Med for sex orgies?
Why are we pretending your bag isn't buzzing? You bought a vibrator.
Ok, well, I guess I'm off to your little S&M fantasy island, where the little guy runs around yelling, "The pain! The pain!"
Listen, I've had my share of bad times with men, okay? Some are a**holes, Elliot is not. If we don't cultivate the good ones, there aren't going to be any.

You took off your clothes in his office? I could never do that, you know. Even at home, I take off my clothes in the bathroom and then I jump into bed real quick... which is kinda wierd because I live alone.
I'll catch you later, I gotta get a bikini wax.
Ugh! Just stop telling me about that disgusting female stuff. No wonder you were never married.
I have PMS too, do you know that?
Ay!
Sometimes I bloat...
Nnnn!
weight gain...
Hey!
temporary water build-up...
Aah!
I hate to tell you this Fred, I clot...
Ay ye ye!
heavy flow days...
Eeh!

[fondling Elliot Slater who is naked]
You know how some men like women's legs, some like big breasts, some like long hair? Know what I like?
[squeezes Elliot's butt]
I like butts. Men's beautiful behinds. You know what I like to do to gorgeous butts? I like to squeeze them, pinch them and caress them.
[is doing all this as she speaks]
And finally, the experts predict, to survive intamacy in the year 2000, women will learn to be more sexually aggressive, and men more romantic.
I always have trouble saying your name Martin because Australians have difficulty with the American 'R". It would be a lot easier if your name was Bob.

You've achieved a great deal of success in your creative and artistic field. You've traveled a great deal. You have influential friends. You've dated a bevy of bright and beautiful woman. Yet, with all this, you never had a lasting relationship.
Our back-up finally arrived. Late. Must have been a line up at Dunkin Donuts. We got the diamonds, the bad guys got away. All we know, one of them had a bad cold.
An alternative lifestyle. DO you know what that is? That's just a phrase deviants use to cover up their sex lives.
How can I fulfill your fantasy?
Go paint my house!
We're the only two people on this island without handcuffs.
It's a place for S&M, B&D, and D&S.
M&M?
How do you decide you wanna be a dominatrix? What, do you wake up one day and go, "Hey, I feel like being bossy"?
A guy takes off his pants to *leave* my room. Hm.
Read her her rights and make sure she understands them.

[mocking Nina's accent]
You have the right to remain silent. Anything you say can and vill be used against you...
Why are you busting our chops like this?
Well, I'll tell you. I hate cops an awful lot.

[under her breath]
I'm gonna kill him.
And it doesn't matter that this is a life-and-death issue?
Nope.
Well, do you want us to bribe you with money?
Nope.
You wanna see me naked?
Now that's an idea!
Maybe if you spiced up your sex life a little you wouldn't be divorced.
What do you mean? I spiced it up plenty. Many's the time I let the wife get on top.

You know a lot of people feel a little nervous about this whole submissive/dominant thing at first, but, you know, really the submissive person is always in control. All you have to do is give your partner a little control word, like "yellow."
Yellow... Y'ello! Fred!
May I do my specialty?
Ah, no, I don't really feel like having my toes sucked right now.
I can be fun. I just get paid to be mean.
I just thought it would be great to be alone in a traditional Southern bedroom with...
...no equipment.
Babies *and* bondage, I could do both?
Yeah, I'd love to say, "My wife is a dominatrix."
I can just see myself at the kids' school on career day.
Look... Bondage Man. It's like Elvis goes to Hell.
But isn't there a happy medium. You know, like, I tie you up one night, you tie me up the next night?
It's my dream just to make you happy.
Yeah, you and every man.
After a hard day of smacking people, it's nice to cuddle.
